Name: Trance
About the game: WARNING: This is a very hard game. Please try the demo first. Please do not continue if you can't handle it As Trance wakes up from slumber, she figures out what is happening. She meets old friends who, to her confusion, are now her enemies. One, by one, she fights them. The game is a SHORT and SIMPLE 2D side-scrolling adventure platformer featuring an unlikely pixel graphic style in different worlds.
